Auth.VerificationMessage: Please check your email and verify your account.

FormValidation.MinCharacters: *Please enter a 10-digit phone number without leading zeros
FormValidation.MustBeGreaterThanZero: *Please enter an integer greater than zero
FormValidation.OverMaxCharLimit: *You have exceeded the maximum character limit

Forms.Error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
Forms.SentMessageSuccess: Your message has been successfully sent!
Forms.SentMessageFailed: There was an error sending your message.

Cards.FirstTitle: Explore Diverse Horizons: Your Gateway to a World of Varied Content
Cards.FirstDescription: Embark on a journey through a vast array of content covering an extensive range of topics. From captivating articles and insightful blogs to entertaining videos and thought-provoking podcasts, our platform offers something for everyone. Join us and discover the richness of content waiting to be explored!
Cards.SecondTitle: Unlock Monthly Delights: Fresh Video Content Drops Await!
Cards.SecondDescription: Stay ahead of the curve with our monthly video content releases! From gripping documentaries to thrilling series, there's always something new to immerse yourself in. Subscribe now and never miss out on the latest entertainment!
Cards.ThirdTitle: Join Our Educational Odyssey: Where Learning Knows No Bounds
Cards.ThirdDescription: Embark on a journey of endless learning possibilities! Join our vibrant education community today and unlock a world of knowledge, collaboration, and growth. Together, let's shape a brighter future through the power of education!

Contact.Title: Contact
Contact.Description: Interested in working with us? Have a question? We'd love to hear from you. Reach out using the form below or email us directly at hello@example.com.

AcademicCounselors.Title: Academic Counselors
AcademicCounselors.SalesPhrase: Unlock your full potential with our team of dedicated academic counselors, guiding you towards success every step of the way. Elevate your learning experience with personalized support tailored to your educational journey.

NotFound.Message: We couldn't find or lost the page you were looking for.
